p.s: The given scene is an excerpt from the movie The Hate U Give, directed by George Tillmann Jr. and was published in 2018.
It deals with racism and a black girl, who has to grow with it.

In the scene, Starr, the main character, is at school and sees her boyfriend, but they haven't really spoken for a while, because Chris, her boyfriend, wanted to have sex, but Starr wasn't ready and got angry.
The scene can be divided into three parts.
In the beginning, Chris, shows up but Starr doesn't want to talk and looks away.
They still talk but Starr is angry.
Chris shows her a beat he made for her and plays it out loud.
He even starts dancing, which makes Starr laugh.
Starr pulls him to a less crowded room, where they will kiss.
